explains: adj. [解剖] 阴道的；叶鞘的
wordGroup: vaginal delivery 阴道分娩；经阴道分娩
vaginal opening n. 阴道口；阴道张开

sentences.en: Sometimes a normal vaginal discharge can irritate the skin.
sentences.cn: 有些时候，正常的分泌物也可能使皮肤发炎。

sentences.en: The dashing of that hope is a real blow, but there are other approaches to vaginal microbicides.
sentences.cn: 这个希望的破灭如同一场风暴，但是有其他方法完成杀微生物剂。
